event.title: 10:45 p.m. Friday when she was grabbed

data.event: A woman was in the parking lot of the 7-Eleven in the 800 block of South Fourth Street at about 10:45 p.m. Friday when she was grabbed from behind, according to DeKalb Police.
Bond was set at $20,000 Saturday morning for Johnson during an appearance in the DeKalb County Courthouse, according to staff at the DeKalb County Jail.
